item.title: Concepts: Flavor
item.description:
The flavor component is a part of a template for Vela.

This declaration allows you to route your build to a single flavors within a Vela cluster.

Syntax

The following is an example of valid syntax for the component:

version: "1"
metadata:
template: false
worker:
+ flavor: large

steps:
- name: test
image: golang
commands:
- go test ./...
